Reviews.Title: Waste your money
Reviews.Author: annette
Reviews.Content: I had high expectations for this product but when I got it, the picture quality was very bad. I would NOT recommend this to anyone!!! The sound was also very bad!!! So disappointed for this item better you buy a good one but not this one. I make sure you waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste money
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: I got this camera and hooked it up everything was fine.  I move it to where I wanted it and then nothing. The power is on but no picture.

Reviews.Title: It was ok
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Delivery was fast, the camera did work out when connected to a TV. But it does not work with my Samsung DVR system and the component line from the back of the camera is very easy to fall out. These preventing me from give the product a five stars rating.
